attributes.action: to not allow the import of biofuel from countries which are destroying rain forest to grow the crops.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The demand for biofuels have accelerated the destruction of the rain forest. 3/4 of Indonesia's rain forests have been destroyed for financial gain. The UK and other users of bio fules should not allow the the import of biofuels which have been grown in countries allowing this destruction to occur.
